description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任第38军军长、成都军区司令员，在朝鲜战争中指挥的第38军有“万岁军”之称。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army of China, served as the commander of the 38th Army and the Chengdu Military Region. The 38th Army he commanded in the Korean War was known as the 'Long Live Army'.

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Liang Xingchu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1927年至1937年间领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Communist Party of China from 1927 to 1937.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的培养军事和政治干部的学校。
description.en: A school founded by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War to train military and political cadres.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军高等军事学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高等军事学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军培养高级指挥员的最高学府。
description.en: The highest institution for training senior commanders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中共干部，曾指控梁兴初为托派。
description.en: A CPC cadre during the Second Sino-Japanese War who once accused Liang Xingchu of being a Trotskyist.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的创建者和领导人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第38集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第38集团军
en: 38th Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一支王牌部队，因在朝鲜战争中的出色表现被誉为“万岁军”。
description.en: An elite unit of the PLA Ground Force, acclaimed as the 'Long Live Army' for its outstanding performance in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共中央副主席、国务院副总理、国防部长，后在“林彪事件”中身亡。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and Minister of National Defense. He died in the 'Lin Biao Incident'.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一，由林彪指挥的东北人民解放军对东北的国民革命军发起的决战。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the Chinese Civil War, a decisive battle launched by the Northeast People's Liberation Army under Lin Biao's command against the National Revolutionary Army in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 辽沈战役中的一场关键性阻击战，由梁兴初率领的第10纵队在黑山、大虎山地区顽强阻击了国民党军廖耀湘兵团。
description.en: A crucial blocking action during the Liaoshen Campaign, where the 10th Column led by Liang Xingchu tenaciously held back the KMT's Liao Yaoxiang Army Group in the Heishan and Dahushan areas.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，在辽沈战役中任第九兵团司令官，被俘。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army, served as the commander of the 9th Army Group during the Liaoshen Campaign and was captured.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，新六军军长，在辽沈战役中被俘。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army and commander of the New Sixth Army, captured during the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民志愿军司令员兼政治委员。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and the Commander and Political Commissar of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的战争，中国人民志愿军参与其中。
description.en: A war between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Korea, in which the Chinese People's Volunteer Army participated.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中由美国领导的多国部队，与朝鲜人民军和中国人民志愿军作战。
description.en: The multinational military force led by the United States during the Korean War, which fought against the Korean People's Army and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 指中共中央副主席林彪及其家人在试图乘机叛逃苏联途中坠毁于蒙古的政治事件，此事对中国政局产生深远影响，梁兴初等人因此受到牵连。
description.en: Refers to the political event where Lin Biao, Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee, and his family died in a plane crash in Mongolia while attempting to defect to the Soviet Union. The incident had a profound impact on Chinese politics and implicated figures such as Liang Xingchu.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Liang Xingchu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，梁兴初逝世于此。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Liang Xingchu passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国家主席，在文化大革命期间被迫害致死。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区
en: Chengdu Military Region of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设置的七大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，因林彪事件受到牵连。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, implicated in the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，因林彪事件受到牵连。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, implicated in the Lin Biao incident.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会
en: 9th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1969年至1973年间的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China from 1969 to 1973.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国共内战时期于东北地区建立的武装力量，后改称东北人民解放军。
description.en: The armed forces established by the Communist Party of China in Northeast China during the Chinese Civil War, later renamed the Northeast People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任东北民主联军第十纵队政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, served as the Political Commissar of the 10th Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 任桂兰是梁兴初的妻子。
description.en: Ren Guilan was the spouse of Liang Xingchu.

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初于1913年8月23日出生于江西省吉安县。
description.en: Liang Xingchu was born in Jian County, Jiangxi Province on August 23, 1913.

description.zh-cn: 1930年4月，梁兴初参加中国工农红军。
description.en: In April 1930, Liang Xingchu joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1930年11月，梁兴初加入中国共产党。
description.en: In November 1930, Liang Xingchu joined the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1936年，梁兴初进入抗日军政大学学习。
description.en: In 1936, Liang Xingchu enrolled in the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军高等军事学院

description.zh-cn: 1960年，梁兴初毕业于中国人民解放军高等军事学院。
description.en: In 1960, Liang Xingchu graduated from the PLA Higher Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 长征途经哈达铺时，梁兴初奉命搜集报纸，促使毛泽东决策红军进军陕北。
description.en: During the Long March, while passing through Hadapu, Liang Xingchu was ordered to collect newspapers, which prompted Mao Zedong to decide to march the Red Army to northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，梁兴初被王凤鸣指控为托派，险遭杀害。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Liang Xingchu was accused by Wang Fengming of being a Trotskyist and was nearly killed.

description.zh-cn: 在梁兴初被王凤鸣指控为托派时，经罗荣桓干预而幸免于难。
description.en: When Liang Xingchu was accused by Wang Fengming of being a Trotskyist, he was saved through the intervention of Luo Ronghuan.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，刘少奇视察115师与山东军区时，与梁兴初等人合影。
description.en: In 1942, when Liu Shaoqi inspected the 115th Division and the Shandong Military Region, he was photographed with Liang Xingchu and others.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，刘少奇视察115师与山东军区时，与梁兴初、罗荣桓等人合影。
description.en: In 1942, when Liu Shaoqi inspected the 115th Division and the Shandong Military Region, he was photographed with Liang Xingchu, Luo Ronghuan and others.

position.zh-cn: 第一纵队副司令员、第六纵队副司令员、第十纵队司令员
position.en: Deputy Commander of the 1st Column, Deputy Commander of the 6th Column, Commander of the 10th Column

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初在东北民主联军时期先后担任第一、第六纵队副司令员和第十纵队司令员。
description.en: During his time in the Northeast Democratic United Army, Liang Xingchu served successively as Deputy Commander of the 1st and 6th Columns, and Commander of the 10th Column.

description.zh-cn: 在辽沈战役期间，梁兴初奉东北人民解放军司令员林彪之命，率部参加黑山阻击战。
description.en: During the Liaoshen Campaign, under the orders of Lin Biao, commander of the Northeast People's Liberation Army, Liang Xingchu led his troops in the Battle of Heishan.

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初率领第10纵队发起了黑山阻击战，成功阻击了廖耀湘兵团。
description.en: Liang Xingchu led the 10th Column to launch the Battle of Heishan, successfully blocking the Liao Yaoxiang Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 在黑山阻击战中，梁兴初率部阻击了国民党军廖耀湘兵团。
description.en: In the Battle of Heishan, Liang Xingchu led his troops to block the KMT's Liao Yaoxiang Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 黑山阻击战后，梁兴初率领的第10纵队参与围歼廖耀湘兵团，并俘虏了新六军军长李涛。
description.en: After the Battle of Heishan, the 10th Column led by Liang Xingchu participated in the encirclement and annihilation of the Liao Yaoxiang Army Group, capturing Li Tao, the commander of the New Sixth Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第38集团军

description.zh-cn: 1949年5月，梁兴初调任第38军军长，并率该部参加朝鲜战争。
description.en: In May 1949, Liang Xingchu was transferred to be the commander of the 38th Army and led this unit in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争中，梁兴初率领中国人民志愿军第38军与联合国军作战。
description.en: In the Korean War, Liang Xingchu led the 38th Army of the Chinese People's Volunteers to fight against the UN forces.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第38集团军

description.zh-cn: 因第38军在朝鲜战争第二次战役中的杰出表现，志愿军司令彭德怀亲拟电报嘉奖，并在电报末尾写下“第38军万岁”，该军因此被称为“万岁军”。
description.en: Due to the outstanding performance of the 38th Army in the Second Phase Campaign of the Korean War, the Volunteer Army Commander Peng Dehuai personally drafted a telegram of commendation, ending with 'Long live the 38th Army!', which led to the army being called the 'Long Live Army'.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 1967年3月，梁兴初任成都军区司令员。
description.en: In March 1967, Liang Xingchu became the commander of the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1969年，在中共九大上当选中央委员。
description.en: In 1969, he was elected as a member of the Central Committee at the 9th National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1971年林彪事件后，梁兴初受到牵连，于1972年被免职并接受审查。
description.en: After the Lin Biao incident in 1971, Liang Xingchu was implicated, dismissed from his post in 1972, and placed under investigation.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1981年10月，中共中央决定为梁兴初平反，免于党内外一切处分，恢复其大军区正职待遇。
description.en: In October 1981, the CPC Central Committee decided to rehabilitate Liang Xingchu, exempting him from all punishments inside and outside the party and restoring his treatment as a military region commander.

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初与陈仁麒、谢家祥一同因林彪事件受到牵连并被审查。
description.en: Liang Xingchu, along with Chen Renqi and Xie Jiaxiang, was implicated and investigated in connection with the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 梁兴初与陈仁麒、谢家祥一同因林彪事件受到牵连并被审查。
description.en: Liang Xingchu, along with Chen Renqi and Xie Jiaxiang, was implicated and investigated in connection with the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 1947年9月东北民主联军第十纵队组建时，梁兴初任司令员，周赤萍任政治委员。
description.en: When the 10th Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army was formed in September 1947, Liang Xingchu was the commander and Zhou Chiping was the political commissar.
